data.text: @MarciaOnTheGo Chevron and Shell are only 8cents more(Top Tier Branded Gas) compared to CanAm,Fuel Pantry, & Speedway(Unbranded Lower Quality). I rather spend the extra $3 difference & get way better engineered gas which is better for my engine. And Shell/Chevron Gas alot slower#BrandedQuality

@MarciaOnTheGo @Latenite72 Your mechanic would tell you to stop buying that one, Marcia. 😝 It’s known to be full of gunk that causes engine problems. He strongly recommends not that one & the Chevron there instead. Will save you $$ in the long run.

@geroysimon @MarciaOnTheGo Depending on quality of the gas you want in your car..there are 2 types gas stations in Point Roberts. Top Tier Branded Stations(Shell and Chevron) vs Unbranded Lower Quality Stations(CanAm, Speedway, Fuel Pantry). Only 10 cents difference to get Top Tier Gas.(Shell or Chevron)

@MarciaOnTheGo Depending on quality of the gas you want in your car..there are 2 types gas stations in Point Roberts. Top Tier Branded Stations(Shell and Chevron) vs Unbranded Lower Quality Stations(CanAm, Speedway, Fuel Pantry). Only 10 cents difference to get Top Tier Gas.(Shell or Chevron)
@MarciaOnTheGo Having dropped $70 on 34 Litres today… this stings. Might be a better idea to go there next.
@geroysimon That being said Geroy, point Roberts is the exception to other American stops.
@geroysimon No we did not. Just the ArriveCAN App and all of our stuff uploaded to that. The apparently send home rapid tests to some but we were not one. We were they 45 minutes and was easy
@MarciaOnTheGo Did you need to take a Covid test to come back?
@MarciaOnTheGo @lyteforce But you need to pay for a rapid test.
